_meta.description: Marketing descriptions for Harbinger flooring products
_meta.sync_note: This file contains curated marketing copy for each product. To sync with vendor data: 1) Run 'npm run sync-harbinger' to pull latest product specs from vendor_products_clean.csv, 2) Review any new products that need marketing copy added, 3) Series hooks define the 'unique selling point' for each collection. When adding new products, match the aesthetic tone of sentence 1 to the product's color/style, and keep sentence 2 consistent within the series.

series_hooks.Contract: Commercial-grade glue-down vinyl at contractor pricing, built for heavy-traffic installs with 4S scratch/stain/scuff protection.
series_hooks.Craftsman: Design-forward visuals with durable glue-down performance — available in wide planks and large-format stone tiles.
series_hooks.Essentials: Clean, neutral palette in a versatile glue-down build — straightforward durability for any space.
series_hooks.Harbinger Acoustic Click: Rigid composite core with cork backing delivers stability, sound reduction, and a refined upscale finish.
series_hooks.Signature Acoustic Click: Floating click install with integrated cork underlayment for quiet comfort and realistic embossed texture.
series_hooks.The Quiet Zone: IXPE acoustic layer attached to LVT for quieter rooms, glue-down stability, and a soft feel underfoot.

harbinger-contract-bonsai-maple.name: Bonsai Maple
harbinger-contract-bonsai-maple.description: A warm maple tone with subtle grain variation that brings organic warmth to modern interiors. Commercial-grade glue-down vinyl with 4S coating for scratch, stain, and scuff resistance in high-traffic spaces.
